summary: Frontend design system specification for Academic Life OS with botanical/earth-tone theme. Defines colour palettes for both light and dark modes, typography using Inter/Instrument Serif/DM Mono, layout structure (sidebar + flexible columns), component patterns (cards, badges, tasks, timetable blocks, AI chat), CSS custom properties, Tailwind config, and frontend file structure. Includes embedded Stitch design mockups for dashboard (light/dark) and tasks page.
